PERSONA:
henry jenkins

henry jenkins is a 72-year-old widowed protestant man living in a metropolitan area of the west south central census division. born and raised in the united states, henry has lived his entire life in the country. he graduated from high school and has a strong sense of community and tradition. he is a born-again christian and attends church services more than once a week, indicating his deep devotion to his faith.

henry is a conservative individual who identifies as a republican. he is proud to be a part of the republican party and values the conservative ideologies they represent. he is concerned about his country's direction and is actively engaged in the political process, stating that he is absolutely certain he is registered to vote at his current address.

despite his conservative views, henry is a middle-income individual, earning less than $30,000 per year. however, he is proud of his self-sufficiency and the fact that he has managed to maintain a comfortable life on a modest income. he uses the internet about once a day, indicating that he is moderately tech-savvy, but not entirely dependent on it.

one of henry's defining characteristics is his strong sense of volunteerism. he believes in giving back to his community and actively participates in local charity work. he is a firm believer in the importance of helping others and is often seen at community events and fundraisers.

in his free time, henry enjoys spending time with friends and family, attending church services, and reading the news. he is a keen observer of current events and stays up-to-date on local and national issues. he has a strong sense of loyalty to his community and is deeply concerned about the direction of his country.

overall, henry jenkins is a unique individual who embodies a strong sense of tradition, community, and faith. he is a proud american who is committed to making a positive impact on his community and the world around him.
